4.m: She will bear a son, and you shall call his name Jesus, for he will save his people from their sins. - Matthew 1:21 (ESV)

l.q: Why should Joseph take Mary as his wife and not divorce her?
l.a: Joseph shouldn't fear to take Mary as his wife because the child is from the Holy Spirit.

l.q: What does the name Immanuel mean?
l.a: Immanuel means God is with us.

l.q: Why should Joseph name his son 'Jesus'?
l.a: Joseph should name his son 'Jesus' because he will save his people from their sins.
